subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|蓺|云}}.

<!--

1.(会意) Associative Compound. Person holds a clump of soil 埶, plating grass 艹 in the mist 云.
2.(形声) Pictophonetic. 艹 (grass), 云 (say) suggest the meaning while 埶 provides the sound.
https://www.yellowbridge.com/chinese/character-etymology.php?zi=%E8%97%9D
-->
